title: Coming Altered
description: One night. One memory. One tour.A one-night stand was all Cassidy had expected. She didn’t sign up for the memories. Memories where the sexy, muscled man from the bar had played her body like an instrument. She never imagined that she’d see him again, or that he would give her the opportunity of a lifetime.Harlan knew the moment he caught the beautiful woman’s attention in the bar that she wanted him. He didn’t suspect that she would leave him in the middle of the night - that is usually his MO. When the same woman ends up on his tour he’ll do whatever he can to keep her close. A tour that exposes their secrets and threatens more than just their love.
author: Renee Harless
